known_issues: Footer settings in admin panel causing error when opened
Footer section headings inconsistent with rest of UI
Admin panel settings menu crowded and overlapped in mobile mode

existing_features.title: Fix the error that occurs when opening footer settings in the admin panel
Make footer section headings consistent with the rest of the UI styling and typography
Fix the admin panel settings menu layout in mobile mode to prevent crowding and overlapping of section options

projectName: Fix footer settings error and admin panel mobile issues
